name: Poole
description:
This game involves a network game, but you can also play alone.
Each player controls a ball that can be customized in the lobby. The ball has two modes: friendly and aggressive. In friendly mode, the ball can move freely, but it cannot push other balls. In aggressive mode, he pushes others, but moves only towards the push with the accumulation of force. The task of the game is to push the white ball or the balls of other players into the hole
